column4: i have no sound with the flashplugin when watching youtube, but xmms works fine.  sound in flash file doesn't work even if i don't have anything else open.. any ideas?
nothing abnormal i don't think so
what I am suggesting is that may be you have to have the correct codecs installed for whatever you are trying to listen to
Well, I didn't have w32codecs, just got 'em.  i'll try this youtube vid again
no problem for me, I use xine engine, libxine-extracodecs & w32codecs
called flashplugin-nonfree but why are you doing that?
I'm just tryin to get the audio to work
if you have flash already installed you don't need to do anything more with that
Well, what might be wrong with the audio?  it works on some sites
don't have the correct codecs installed is the most likely cause I would say, but might be wrong
How can i tell what codecs I have installed, and what this flash file is trying to use?
not sure with adept but with synaptic search codecs and it will show you which ones you have installed
I don't know what it is using, only that it works for me with the combination I gave you
